DOC.brief_summary: An open-label dose escalation study patient solid tumor treat STA-9090 ( ganetespib )
DOC.brief_title: Study STA-9090 , Administered Twice-Weekly Patients With Solid Tumors
DOC.detailed_description: This open-label Phase 1 dose-escalation study patient solid tumor treat STA-9090 ( ganetespib ) evaluate safety , tolerance efficacy .
DOC.criteria: Patients must document refractory candidate current approve therapy . Must anECOG status 02 . Peripheral neuropathy ? 2 . Must acceptable organ marrow function per protocol parameter . No clinically significant ventricular arrythmias ischemia . Must pregnant breastfeeding . No chemotherapy radiation within 3 weeks.. No previous radiation > 25 % total bone marrow . No previous high dose chemotherapy autologous allogeniec hematopoietic stem cell transplantation . No primary brain tumor active brain metastasis . No use investigational agent within 4 week . No treatment chronic immunosuppressant . No uncontrolled , intercurrent illness .
DOC.keyword: histologically cytologically confirm non-hematological malignancy metastatic unresectable
